text: @GOP @KellyannePolls The hallmark of the trump-Pence administration is the deaths of over 130,000 Americans due to the administration's spectacular failure and inadequacy in addressing the COVID-19 pandemic.  Their game plan has been to downplay and deny, rather than to institute meaningful measures.
